verses.verse: Moreover take thou <S%H859>up<s%> <S%H5375><s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is thy <S%H517>mother?<s%> A <S%H3833>lioness:<s%> she lay <S%H7257>down<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> <S%H738>lions,<s%> she <S%H7235>nourished<s%> her <S%H1482>whelps<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> young <S%H3715>lions.<s%>

And she brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of her <S%H4480>whelps:<s%> <S%H1482><s%> it <S%H1961>became<s%> a young <S%H3715>lion,<s%> and it <S%H3925>learned<s%> to <S%H2963>catch<s%> the <S%H2964>prey;<s%> it <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H120>men.<s%>

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> also <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H413>of<s%> him; he was <S%H8610>taken<s%> in their <S%H7845>pit,<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> him with <S%H2397>chains<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Now when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> she had <S%H3176>waited,<s%> and her <S%H8615>hope<s%> was <S%H6>lost,<s%> then she <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> of her <S%H4480>whelps,<s%> <S%H1482><s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> him a young <S%H3715>lion.<s%>

And he went up and <S%H1980>down<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H738>lions,<s%> he <S%H1961>became<s%> a young <S%H3715>lion,<s%> and <S%H3925>learned<s%> to <S%H2963>catch<s%> the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H120>men.<s%>

And he <S%H3045>knew<s%> their desolate <S%H759>palaces,<s%> and he laid <S%H2717>waste<s%> their <S%H5892>cities;<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H3456>desolate,<s%> and the <S%H4393>fullness<s%> thereof, by the <S%H4480>noise<s%> <S%H6963><s%> of his <S%H7581>roaring.<s%>

Then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him on every <S%H5439>side<s%> from the <S%H4480>provinces,<s%> <S%H4082><s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> their <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him: he was <S%H8610>taken<s%> in their <S%H7845>pit.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>put<s%> him in <S%H5474>ward<s%> in <S%H2397>chains,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> him into <S%H4679>holds,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> should <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thy <S%H517>mother<s%> is like a <S%H1612>vine<s%> in thy <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H8362>planted<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> she <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and full of <S%H6058>branches<s%> by reason of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4480>waters.<s%> <S%H4325><s%>

And she <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>rods<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> the <S%H7626>scepters<s%> of them that bore <S%H4910>rule,<s%> and her <S%H6967>stature<s%> was <S%H1361>exalted<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> <S%H996><s%> the thick <S%H5688>branches,<s%> and she <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in her <S%H1363>height<s%> with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of her <S%H1808>branches.<s%>

But she was plucked <S%H5428>up<s%> in <S%H2534>fury,<s%> she was cast <S%H7993>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit:<s%> her <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>rods<s%> were <S%H6561>broken<s%> and <S%H3001>withered;<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> them.
And <S%H6258>now<s%> she is <S%H8362>planted<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in a <S%H6723>dry<s%> and <S%H6772>thirsty<s%> <S%H776>ground.<s%>

And <S%H784>fire<s%> is gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of a <S%H4480>rod<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of her <S%H905>branches,<s%> which hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> so that she <S%H1961>hath<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> to be a <S%H7626>scepter<s%> to <S%H4910>rule.<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is a <S%H7015>lamentation,<s%> and shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for a <S%H7015>lamentation.<s%>
